name: Maze And Dice
description:
The unpredictable dice, the ever-changing maze. Let Chaos guide your way, and win the race with least point.

The beauty of a dice is that it is never predictable. 6 values, only revealed when it is at rest. With that, let's play a game. Race to the finish line and get as low points as possible.

May fortune favors the bold.

Maze And Dice is made as part of GMTK Game Jam 2022. The game currently only feature 1 level, with more changes coming soon.
